     <a class="headline publication-font" data-link-tracking="" href="https://www.mirror.co.uk/tv/tv-news/sas-star-ant-middleton-axed-23594325">
      SAS star Ant Middleton axed by Channel 4 after 'inappropriate comments' to female staff
     </a>
     <div class="comments-count">
      <a aria-label="Comments for SAS star Ant Middleton axed by Channel 4 after 'inappropriate comments' to female staff" class="viafoura" href="https://www.mirror.co.uk/tv/tv-news/sas-star-ant-middleton-axed-23594325#comments-section">

       </span>
      </a>
     </div>
     <a class="description" href="https://www.mirror.co.uk/tv/tv-news/sas-star-ant-middleton-axed-23594325">
      TV bosses said they will never work with the star again because of his personal conduct
     </a>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="pancake use-image-placeholders quartet channel-ece_frontpage" data-group="wipeout" data-group-index="1">
    <div class="teaser">
     <figure data-mod="image">
      <a aria-label="Rishi Sunak will extend furlough until the end of September in the Budget" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|Rec|news|wipeout|image|index 1" href="https://www.mirror.co.uk/news/politics/budget-2021-furlough-extended-september-23595094">
       <img alt="" data-src="https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article23595455.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_BRITAIN-POLITICS-HEALTH-VIRUS.jpg" data-srcset="https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article23595455.ece/ALTERNATES/s180/0_BRITAIN-POLITICS-HEALTH-VIRUS.jpg 180w, https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article23595455.ece/ALTERNATES/s220b/0_BRITAIN-POLITICS-HEALTH-VIRUS.jpg 220w, https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article23595455.ece/ALTERNATES/s270b/0_BRITAIN-POLITICS-HEALTH-VIRUS.jpg 270w" src="/@trinitymirrordigital/marwood/TM/img/placeholders/transparent.png"/>
      </a>
      <div class="video-icon section-theme-border section-theme">
      </div>
     </figure>
     <a class="headline" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|Rec|news|wipeout|title|index 1" href="https://www.mirror.co.uk/news/politics/budget-2021-furlough-extended-september-23595094">
      Rishi Sunak will extend furlough until the end of September in the Budget
     </a>
     <div>
      <a class="label" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|Rec|news|wipeout|Tag|Fire|index 1" href="https://www.mirror.co.uk/all-about/the-budget">
       The Budget
      </a>
      <div class="comments-count">
       <a aria-label="Comments for Rishi Sunak will extend furlough until the end of September in the Budget" class="viafoura" href="https://www.mirror.co.uk/news/politics/budget-2021-furlough-extended-september-23595094#comments-section">
        <span class="count-number">
         <vf-conversations-count vf-container-id="mirror-prod-23595094">
         </vf-conversations-count>
        </span>
       </a>
      </div>
      <a class="description" data-link-tracking="undefineddescriptionundefined" href="https://www.mirror.co.uk/news/politics/budget-2021-furlough-extended-september-23595094">
       The Chancellor will confirm tomorrow that the job support scheme will continue into the autumn - but will become gradually less generous as lockdown rules are relaxed
      </a>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="teaser">
     <figure data-mod="image">

    <div class="teaser teaser-highlight teaser-prominent">
     <div class="featured-image mod-backgroundImage" data-backgroundimage="https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article23593608.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/1_DeniseMAIN.jpg" data-mod="backgroundImage">
     </div>
     <figure class="section-theme-border" data-mod="image">
      <a aria-label="'We are suprised at how well we've got on': Denise Van Outen says family were brought together by lockdown despite 'tears'" data-link-tracking="" href="https://www.mirror.co.uk/3am/celebrity-news/denise-van-outen-says-family-23594281">

          </a>

   var publicSectionParams = window.TMCONFIG.publicSectionParams;

if (environment === 'prod' && publicSectionParams['hotjar.hjid']) {

{(h.hj.q=h.hj.q||[]).push(arguments)}
;
h._hjSettings={hjid:publicSectionParams['hotjar.hjid'],hjsv:6};
a=o.getElementsByTagName('head')[0];
r=o.createElement('script');r.async=1;

  <script>
   window.console.log("iPhone/Edge Fix running...");
(function (doc) {
var agnt = navigator.userAgent;
var css = ".captify-widget>div>div>div{padding-bottom:30px!important}";
var count = 300; // 300 * 100ms == 30000ms limit
function isIphone() {
return /iPhone/.test(agnt);
}
function isEdge() {
return /Edge/.test(agnt);
}
function isEdgeOrIphone() {
return isIphone() || isEdge();
}
function applyFix() {
var ifr = doc.querySelector(".captify-iframe");
if (ifr && isEdge(agnt)) {
fixEdge(ifr);
} else if (ifr && ifr.contentDocument && ifr.contentDocument.head && isIphone(agnt)) {
fixIphone(ifr.contentDocument);
} else {
count--;
if (count) {
setTimeout(applyFix, 100);
}
}
}
function fixIphone(doc) {
var styleTag = doc.createElement("style");
styleTag.type = "text/css";
styleTag.appendChild(doc.createTextNode(css));
styleTag.cssText = doc.head.appendChild(styleTag);
}
function fixEdge(ifr) {
if (ifr.contentDocument && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes.length) {
//finished
} else {
ifr.classList.add("hidden");
count = 100; // 100 * 50ms == 5000ms limit
setTimeout(unhideEdge, 50, ifr);
}
}
function unhideEdge(ifr){
if (ifr.contentDocument && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes.length) {
ifr.classList.remove("hidden");
} else {
count--;
if (count) {
setTimeout(unhideEdge, 50, ifr);
}
}
}
if (isEdgeOrIphone()) {
applyFix();
}
})(document);
  </script>

setTimeout(function() {

}, 3000);
});
  </script>
